column4: I was doing nothing special, when everything slowed to a crawl.  I switched to tty6 to see what was causing the problem, and then a process was killed because the system was "out of memory". but only 9% of swap is used, and I have 2GB free RAM. What might be going on?
Probably the process that ate your ram is not there now..
that was before I got the notice
And it simply allocated beyond 4 gb imho
